column1: The family will receive friends from 1:00 until 2:45 p.m. on Monday
column4: at Owens & Brumley Funeral Home of Burkburnett. Interment will follow at 3:00 p.m. at the Burkburnett Cemetery with Rev. Joe Coombs officiating. Arrangements are under the direction of Owens & Brumley Funeral Home of Burkburnett.
